metadata.name: Anixbirth (Hope - Teasrer)
metadata.description:
WE ARE STILL IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT!
SO, we are doing a ENEMY MOD with a character (or two) in a WAVE system! Hopefully 10 monsters per wave, with about 25 - 50 rooms per wave!
Some AWESOME credits - Fiend Folio API for Fortunes! Helps support loading all our sickass fortunes. ProAPI for movement API! The movement of the Schmoot and other mobs would not be possible without it.
Cool beans! Join us by finding our discord link at Modding Of Isaac.
